title: Deathfire touch
body:
So basically i had an MF, that to put it nicely, was stupid and thought that Deathfire Touch worked on MF's Passive.

So i am here (kinda to stop me from tilting completely.) to try and clear something up.

Deathfire Touch does not activate on things considered an Auto Attack (Ezreal Q, MF Q and the like).

Deathfire Touch doesn't activate on many passives.

Deathfire Touch if it does work gives a visual indicator, and deals magic damage over time.

Yes. If the ability is considered "on-hit" (Teemo's E, Fizz's passive W, Gangplank Q, etc) it will not proc Deathfire Touch, but it will proc Thunderlord's Decree.
